apps.localizedDescription:
Spotilife is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

 Sposify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that adds various enhancements to the Spotify IOS application.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus

 We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency. privacy.name: camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.

privacy.name: photos
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.

privacy.name: music
privacy.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.

privacy.name: motion
privacy.usageDescription: Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.

privacy.name: microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.

privacy.name: bluetooth
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.

privacy.name: network
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.

privacy.name: faceid
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

apps.name: PojavLauncher
apps.subtitle: Bringing Minecraft: Java Edition to mobile devices.
apps.versionDescription: PojavLauncher 2.2 Deepslate puts a focus on our core functionality, working to squash bugs, improve performance, and increase reliability.
apps.localizedDescription:
PojavLauncher is a Minecraft: Java Edition launcher for iOS and Android based on the Boardwalk project.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play most versions of Minecraft, from the very first beta to the latest snapshots.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize with mods, resource packs, and compatible shaders
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create multiple instances of Minecraft for multiple versions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adjust on-screen controls to your liking, or use keyboard and mouse or controllers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play online with full Java Edition servers
...and so much more!

Notice: PojavLauncher iOS requires JIT to function correctly. This application automatically enables JIT with JITStreamer, TrollStore, or when jailbroken, however other methods can be used if required.

news.title: PojavLauncher 2.2 Deepslate
news.caption: The next release of PojavLauncher is out now - get it now!

news.title: PojavLauncher 2.1.3 - New bug fix release, available now.
news.caption: This minor release backports a few fixes, and includes new packages for iOS 15.
